q1.title: How do I set up the camera to record my matches?
q1.description: The Camera should be atleast 7 meters away from the court center line and atleast 3 meters high

q2.title: Do I need special equipment?
q2.description: No, a mobile camera is all you need!

q3.title: Which sports are supported?
q3.description: Currently only Tennis with Table Tennis and padle coming soon.

q4.title: Can I use this during tournaments?
q4.description: Absolutly! we encourage all our users to use the app during their matches to get the best results.

q5.title: Do I need an internet connection?
q5.description: Yes internet connection is required in order to use the app

q6.title: How long does the analysis take?
q6.description: Depending on the length of the video analysis timing may vary, however usual rule of thumb is 1 hour of footage is about 40 minutes of analysis time

q7.title: I can't upload my Video
q7.description: Please try closing the tab and opening a new one, then proceed to upload the video again and wait untill upload is 100% complete before clicking on the next button. If you still run into the same problem please contact our support team aby using the Contact Us button bellow or leave us a direct message in our whats app group

q8.title: Why can't I find my coach or athlete
q8.description: Make sure that the person you are trying to search for is already signed up. If they are not yet try sending them a manual invite Link

q9.title: Why can't I see my AI reports yet
q9.description: AI reports are not available yet, we will notify you soon when we launch it

q10.title: How do I get credits?
q10.description: Go through the upload flow and when you reach the AI feature selection page click the + icon from there select either the Pay As You Go option or the 12.99 subscription to buy more credits
